utils

Class LexUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.LexUtils

extends java.lang.Object
    The class with utility methods related to lexing.

      • extendTokens

        public static Token[] extendTokens(Token[] tokens)
        Extend a token array to contain similar tokens.
        Parameters:
        tokens - Array of Tokens to extend.
        Returns:
        Extended array of tokens.

      • extractFeatureUsage

        public static int[] extractFeatureUsage(java.lang.String string)
        Extract the feature usage of the solution.
        Parameters:
        string - Solution to extract usage of.
        Returns:
        Feature usage of the solution.

      • getContent

        public static java.lang.String[] getContent(java.lang.String input,
                                            boolean withSyntax,
                                            boolean extended)
        Do all the lexing stuff given pre and/or post conditions.
        Parameters:
        input - pre and/or post condition.
        withSyntax - output with or without Syntax Tokens.
        extended - whether to extend the content with similar tokens.
        Returns:
        string array containing all used tokens.

      • getContentAndAllTokens

        public static java.lang.String[] getContentAndAllTokens(java.lang.String input)

      • lex

        public static Token[] lex(java.lang.String input)
        Lex the given input.
        Parameters:
        input - The String to lex, format should be in the JavaEDSL.
        Returns:
        Array of tokens, each describing an item contained in the input.

      • uniqueTokens

        public static java.lang.String[] uniqueTokens(Token[] tokens,
                                              boolean withSyntax)
        Returns array with all unique items, with or without Syntax.
        Parameters:
        tokens - Array of Tokens that may contain duplicates.
        withSyntax - Return array contains or not contains any Syntax.
        Returns:
        Array of Tokens without duplicates.
